Classes in org.jvnet.hk2.test.runlevel used by org.jvnet.hk2.test.runlevel
AHolderBasedServerService1
          This is an example that "breaks the rules" for the RLS: - it injects services of a different scope - it injects services at a higher run level value It's all allowed to work because it is using Holder injection where the Holder's go away when the corresponding RL- annotated services go away.
